itunes:title: S1, E8: Are My Kids on Track: Social Milestone Ownership
title: S1, E8: Are My Kids on Track: Social Milestone Ownership
itunes:author: That Sounds Fun Network
itunes:subtitle: In this episode we talk about how to help your kids take ownership for their actions, what forgiveness looks like, the stumbling blocks to taking ownership and ways to prompt your kids to take ownership. This episode is a companion to chapter 7...
itunes:summary:
In this episode we talk about how to help your kids take ownership for their actions, what forgiveness looks like, the stumbling blocks to taking ownership and ways to prompt your kids to take ownership. This episode is a companion to chapter 7 of the Are My Kids on Track book. Be sure to download the free supplemental small group questions here.
 
Connect with Sissy, David and Melissa @raisingboysandgirls
Connect with Sarah @sarahwbragg or her podcast here
description:
In this episode we talk about how to help your kids take ownership for their actions, what forgiveness looks like, the stumbling blocks to taking ownership and ways to prompt your kids to take ownership. This episode is a companion to chapter 7 of the Are My Kids on Track book. Be sure to download the free supplemental small group questions here.

 

Connect with Sissy, David and Melissa @raisingboysandgirls

Connect with Sarah @sarahwbragg or her podcast here
content:encoded:
In this episode we talk about how to help your kids take ownership for their actions, what forgiveness looks like, the stumbling blocks to taking ownership and ways to prompt your kids to take ownership. This episode is a companion to chapter 7 of the Are My Kids on Track book. Be sure to download the free supplemental small group questions here.

 

Connect with Sissy, David and Melissa @raisingboysandgirls
